FRS 115 Revenue from Contracts with Customers

FRS 115 establishes a five-step model to account for revenue arising from contracts with customers, and introduces new contract cost guidance. Under F RS 115, revenue is recognised at an amount that reﬂects the consideration which an entity expects to be entitled in exchange for transferring goods or services to a customer.

The new revenue standard is effective for annual periods beginning on or after 1 J anuary 2018.

The Group has performed a preliminary impact assessment of adopting FRS 115 based on currently available information and have concluded that the adoption of FRS 115 will not have a material impact on the financial

statements.
